title: Problem with League
body:
So I usually have a normal ping around maybe 86 ... so then I was taking a break from league and I come back to a ping at 400. 
I am realizing that league is also encountering a delay. I don't know what is going on but I hope Riot fixes it soon.!

replies.body:
Most of the time ping spikes like that are caused when something gets in the way of your network's connection to our servers, but there's also a chance that you're running into some packet loss as well. 

Let's take a minute to double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that we could update to make things run a little smoother. Make sure to test those changes in a custom game, and hit me back up if that doesn't seem to help.
